topo

Class GuiConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • topo.GuiConnection

  • public class GuiConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to hold information about a connection in the topology. There should be one GuiConnection for each physical connection between two routers

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String destInterface 
      private java.lang.String destNode 
      private int packetLoss 
      private int packetsIn 
      private int packetsOut

      private java.lang.String sourceNode

      Constructor for the GuiConnection object

    • Constructor Detail

      • GuiConnection

        public GuiConnection(java.lang.String srcRouter,
             java.lang.String srcInt,
             java.lang.String dstRouter,
             java.lang.String dstInt,
             int pktLoss)
        Constructor for the GuiConnection object
        Parameters:
        srcRouter - - String of source router's hostname
        srcInt - - String of source router's interface
        dstRouter - - String of destination router's hostname
        dstInt - - String of source router's interface
        pktLoss - - (int) Starting packetloss percentage (should always be 0)

    • Method Detail

      • getLoss

        public int getLoss()
        This method is used to get the current packet loss of a connection based on the difference between the packetIn and packetOut counters for each connection
        Returns:
        (int) - Percentage of packet loss (0-100%)

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        This method simply checks to see if the connection has seen any packets by checking if the packetsIn or packetsOut counters are greater than 0
        Returns:
        boolean - true if the connection has seen a packet in OR out

      • increaseLoss

        public void increaseLoss()
        This method is used to increase the packetLoss by 1%. Unused at the moment

      • packetIn

        public void packetIn()
        This method is used to increase the packetsIn counter by 1

      • packetOut

        public void packetOut()
        This method is used to increase the packetsOut counter by 1

      • getConnection

        public java.lang.String getConnection()
        This method is used to get the current connection's status in Cytoscape.js format. It will check to see if the connection is active and if so what the packet loss is
        Returns:
        String - current connection in Cytoscape.js format

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String getInfo()
        This method is used for logging and information only. It will display the current connection information
        Returns:
        String - connection information

      • getHue

        public static java.lang.String getHue(int loss)
        This method calculates the color the connection should be based on the loss percentage. It takes that loss number and converts it to a log scale of colors in the HSL format for the Cytoscape.js topology
        Parameters:
        loss - - (int) percentage between 0-100% of packetLoss
        Returns:
        - String of the conneciton's color in Cytoscape.js format

      • grayedOut

        public static java.lang.String grayedOut()
        This method is used to set the color of a connection to grey. It is called initally in Network Discovery when no traffic has been monitored yet
        Returns:
        String of the connection color in Cytoscape.js format
